file_content.text: I echo Hallow Voice, as he echoed Broken Scar. It's alright.
Rightness is dead. My brothers' deaths are black and screaming. But... your words are light.
I am Red Walker. You echo, but are empty of Hallow Voice's scent. The blackness must still shroud him.
His bonds cannot be cut yet. If this place is strewn with thorns like these, they must be blunted.
I promise Hallow Voice will be safe with me.
I can protect him.
Your words... ring clear. I have seen you are a great fortress.
If we wait any longer, it may be too late to save Hallow Voice.
We have to act now.
You hear blades in the dark?
Some "warrior" you are.
My life is a leaf, Hallow Voice's a great tree. I must test his paths.
If you must cut his bonds now, we will leave, and blunt the thorns that cover this place. Hallow Voice's footsteps will be safe.
Here. His blackness writhes here. I place Hallow Voice's light in your hands.
I'll "blunt the thorns" as you would, and guard Hallow Voice.
I'll keep him safe for you.
Count on me.
Yes, yes. Moving on....
Then go well and safely.
Jedi, I heard the Esh-kha speak. Commander Geland and his forces are approaching that position.
I do not know what they intend. I can stall them but not for long.
Go, quickly, and stop the other.
But I have uncovered the master key for Belsavis--claim it if you can. You will need every advantage against Geland. Go, quickly.
